1.eng-name: The Book of Purification and its Sunnah

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibn 'Abbas:"The Prophet bathed to cleanse himself from sexual impurity, then he saw a spot that the water did not reach." Then he motioned with the hair hanging over his shoulders and squeezed (the water from it) over that spot." (Da'if)In his narration, Ishaq said: "So he wrung his hair over it

chapter.ara-name: باب مَنِ اغْتَسَلَ مِنَ الْجَنَابَةِ فَبَقِيَ مِنْ جَسَدِهِ لُمْعَةً لَمْ يُصِبْهَا الْمَاءُ كَيْفَ يَصْنَعُ
chapter.eng-name: One who bathed to cleanse himself from sexual impurity and there remained a spot on his body that was not touched by water: what should he do?
